glsa.title: cURL:Heap-based Buffer Overflow
glsa.synopsis: A heap-based buffer overflow in cURL might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: A command line tool and library for transferring data with URLs.

description.p: A heap-based buffer overflow was discovered in cURLâ€™s Curl_smtp_escape_eob() function.

impact.p: An attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition or execute arbitrary code via SMTP connections.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All cURL users should upgrade to the latest version:
